definitions.definition: To sadden or displease (someone) by underperforming, or by not delivering something promised or hoped for.
definitions.example: His lack of respect disappointed her.

definitions.definition: To deprive (someone of something expected or hoped for).
To fail to meet (an expectation); to fail to fulfil (a hope).
To show (an opinion, belief, etc.) to be mistaken.
Defeated of expectations or hope; experiencing disappointment; let down.
definitions.example: After all his anticipation, the trip left him deeply disappointed.
